data.title: Red Hat OpenShift Data Foundation: Persistent storage and cluster data management for Red Hat OpenShift
data.meta_description: Learn about Red Hat OpenShift Data Foundation as a persistent storage and cluster data management solution. Download today.
data.text:
OpenShift Data Foundation runs anywhere Red Hat OpenShift does: on-premise, in public or private cloud environments, and at the edge. It provides agile and flexible data access using common protocols—file, block, and object—to support a broad range of workloads and applications. The platform abstracts the details and inconsistencies among different underlying storage infrastructures while delivering sophisticated cluster data management services that organizations require.

OpenShift Data Foundation was created for container-based environments and also supports Red Hat OpenShift Virtualization. With a supported Red Hat OpenShift operator, the platform is simple to install and manage as a part of the container-based application life cycle, including cloud-native container management, scheduling, and orchestration.
